content.description: 1.3 miles west of the Beige Siphon Tube is a dirt pullout on the north side of the road.  Hike 50 feet east to the gully then 150 feet up and north to the base of the west facing rock.  This is the Shark's Fin Wall.  The first line of bolts left of the center crack are True Colors.  Go straight up the bolt line to a good stance at a horizontal seam. 5.10.  Without using the rib on the right, smear up a few feet, (5.11), then up over the roof to the 2 bolt anchor.
content.protection: 4 bolts and some 1 to 2 inch cams.  two bolt anchor.
3 bolts and a small to medium size stopper to a two [bolt] anchor.

content.description: 1.3 miles west of the Beige Siphon Tube is a dirt pullout on the north side of the highway.  Walk back east 50 feet to the gully, and head up and north for 100 feet to the base of the west-facing wall.  This rock is the Shark's Fin Rock. On the left side of the Rock, an obvious sharp fin of rock juts out 25 feet up.  Climb up and past it in to rotten rock with little protection.  Traverse right to a two bolt anchor 60 feet up.
content.protection: Sparse gear to 2 inches.  poor gear after 30 feet, a fall up there would suck.

content.description: 1.3 miles from the Beige Siphon Tube is a dirt pullout on the north side of the road.  Walk back east 50 feet to the gully and hike up and north 150 feet the the base of the west-facing rock.  This is the Shark's Fin Wall.  The crack up the center is Shark Bait.  Start under the small roof and climb through the upside down "V".  Near the top, undercling out right or go up the overhanging crack (5.7) to a two bolt anchor.
content.protection:
Gear to 3 inches. You can clip the first bolt of

Stupid Igits

to the right.

content.description: 1.3 miles west of the Beige Siphon Tube is a dirt pullout on the north side of the road.  walk back east to the gully and hike up and north 150 feet to the base of the west-facing wall. This is the Sharks Fin Wall.  The odd crack in a corner on the far right of the wall is Lay Back Crack.  Lay up to the top and traverse left to the 2 bolt anchor.
content.protection: Cams to two inches, traverse left to a two bolt anchor.
